page.title: 05A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY,MORNING SESSION by Gresham Arnold. {At about 9.35am we come out of {assembly and start doing topic.(Topic {is finding out about things).We stop {doing topic at 10.25am and eat our {crisps.At 10.30am we go out to play {for 10 minutes till 10.40am.During {playtime I play football.After {playtime we have mathematics until {11.40 am, when we read books until {12.00pm.At 12.00pm we go home for {dinner (dinner consists of toast and {spaghetti with a drink of orange and a {piece of cake to follow). }
